title: Maddison Brown’s Instagram Is Being Flooded With Thirsty Liam Hemsworth Fans Freaking TF Out
text:
From Cosmopolitan

Fans are flooding Dynasty actress Maddison Brown’s Instagram and freaking out over her reportedly dating Liam Hemsworth.

Liam and Maddison were seen holding hands in NYC in the wake of his split from Miley Cyrus.

In case you haven’t heard the news due to it being Friday and your truly not giving AF about anything except leaving work, Liam Hemsworth is dating someone. And despite your valiant efforts to volunteer as tribute, that someone is Australian actress Maddison Brown.

Maddison plays Kirby Anders on The CW’s Dynasty and was seen walking around New York City with Liam in photos exclusively obtained by TMZ.

Literally no one has any idea how serious they are or whether they’e even dating vs. friends who hold hands, but either way wowowowowow at Maddison’s Instagram right now. It took the internet approximately no time to flood her most recent pics with deeply thirsty comments about Liam and their ~alleged~ relationship, proving that everyone is still willing to do the most even on a Friday afternoon.

Like, Maddison is truly just trying to live her best life with this Piaget #ad, but it’s being swarmed with musings like the following:

Your followers about to raise up lol Liam’s new girl.

How’s Liam doing?

Are you Liam’s mystery girl😍😍😍😍.

So happy for you and Li 💕 [editor’s note: love that this person just casually calls Liam “Li”].

You and Liam a thing?

Not sure if they are dating. Seems like a set up to pay back.

KIRBY WHAT IS THIS LIAM SHIT.

Damn, the internet has no chill whatsoever. Also, reminder that Miley, too, has moved on with an Australian celebrity—aka singer Cody Simpson, who’s already writing poetry about her. It’s a whole thing.
